item.title: 戴森将在英国裁员约 1000 人
item.description: 作为重大重组的一部分，戴森正计划裁减超过四分之一的英国职位。【原文：Dyson is planning to axe more than a quarter of its UK jobs as part of a major restructuring.】

item.title: 华盛顿特区的联合车站正在见证零售业的复兴。但一场法庭之战迫在眉睫
item.description:
随着星巴克和其他公司重返首都的交通枢纽，联合车站的商业业主正在与美国铁路公司对零售业的收购进行斗争。【原文：

With Starbucks and others returning to the capital’s transit hub, Union Station’s commercial landlord is fighting a retail takeover by Amtrak.

】

item.title: CLS 称，基金转变交易模式以适应 T+1 制度
item.description: 在美国于 5 月实行证券单日结算后，投资者提前为股票交易提供资金，并更多地依赖自动化进行交易，而货币市场也在适应新的制度。【原文：Investors are funding stock trades ahead of time and relying more on automation for their transactions after the US moved to one-day securities settlement in May, as the currency market adapts to a new regime.】

item.title: 埃尔多安警告北约不要卷入乌克兰战争
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）周二在领导人峰会前告诫北约盟国，不要采取可能将北约拖入乌克兰战争的措施，以对抗入侵的俄罗斯军队。【原文：Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Tuesday cautioned NATO allies ahead of a leaders’ summit against taking steps that could drag the alliance into war in Ukraine against invading Russian forces.】

item.title: 天气威胁对北美石油造成影响
item.description:
在全球市场岌岌可危的情况下，任何长期中断都有可能导致价格上涨。【原文：

With the global market precariously balanced, any prolonged disruption risks driving prices higher.

】

item.title: 景气消退，特拉菲古拉面临巨额股票回购议案
item.description: 特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）在连续数年获得丰厚利润后，正努力应对巨额股票回购账单，这促使这家大宗商品贸易巨头削减支付给股东的利息。【原文：Trafigura Group is grappling with a hefty share buyback bill after several years of blockbuster profits, prompting the commodity trading giant to cut the interest it pays on money owed to its shareholders.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油运输量创乌克兰入侵以来最大降幅
item.description:
周流量下滑拖累四周平均值降至2月份以来最低

Slump in weekly flows drags four-week average to the lowest since February

】

item.title: 法国左翼呼吁马克龙盟友在联盟中赢得优势
item.description: 法国社会党向埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）运动的一些立法者伸出了橄榄枝，因为在一场导致议会分裂的混乱投票之后，政治角逐愈演愈烈。【原文：France’s Socialist party extended an olive branch to some lawmakers of Emmanuel Macron’s movement as political jockeying gained steam in the aftermath of a messy vote that left parliament divided.】

item.title: 鲍比-杰恩的复杂对冲基金首秀催生粉丝和质疑者
item.description: 在棕榈滩高雅的 Breakers 度假村内，鲍比-杰恩（Bobby Jain）进行了数十亿美元的推销。他的听众：阿布扎比投资局，世界上最大的石油财富之一的管理者，对詹恩来说，也是他的新对冲基金的完美客户。【原文：Inside the elegant Breakers Palm Beach resort, Bobby Jain made his multibillion-dollar pitch. His audience: the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority, steward of one of the world’s great petro-fortunes and, to Jain, a perfect client for his new hedge fund.】

item.title: 纳格尔告诉《每日镜报》，欧洲央行不会自动降息
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）告诉《每日邮报》，欧洲央行 "并没有自动驾驶降息"。【原文：The European Central Bank “isn’t on autopilot on interest-rate cuts,” Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel told Tagesspiegel.】

item.title: 据 Technoz 报道，佐科维考虑推迟迁往新首都的时间
item.description: 据彭博社 Technoz 周二报道，印度尼西亚总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）表示，今年迁往新首都的计划可能会推迟。【原文：Indonesia’s President Joko Widodo signaled that plans to shift to its new capital this year could be delayed, Bloomberg Technoz reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 民调显示法国总统勒庞将赢得第一轮总统选举
item.description: 投票结束后进行的一项民意调查显示，玛丽娜-勒庞将在2027年举行的下届法国总统大选第一轮投票中领先，尽管她领导的极右翼政党国民联盟在周日的立法投票中跌至第三位。【原文：Marine Le Pen would finish in front in the first round of the next French presidential election in 2027, even though her far-right National Rally fell to third place in Sunday’s legislative ballot, according to a poll carried out after voting had ended.】

item.title: 穆迪在政治僵局中警告法国债务前景
item.description: 穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）称，如果政治纷争导致法国财政和债务指标严重恶化，法国的主权评级将面临风险。【原文：France’s sovereign rating is at risk if political wrangling sees its fiscal and debt metrics materially worsen, according to Moody’s Investors Service.】

item.title: 股市动荡，私募股权交易削弱欧洲 IPO 渠道
item.description: 私募股权公司正在抢购首次公开募股的候选公司，在公司纷纷搁置上市计划之际，侵蚀着迅速枯竭的欧洲管道。【原文：Private equity firms are snapping up initial public offering candidates, eating into a fast-depleting European pipeline at a time when companies are shelving listing plans.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。投资者在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的证词期间保持乐观情绪，花旗集团（Citigroup）表示对人工智能获利了结，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统的战斗仍在继续。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Investors stay upbeat while waiting for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s testimony, Citigroup says take profit on AI and President Joe Biden’s battles continue. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 美国小型企业乐观情绪连续第三个月升至 2024 年高点
item.description: 由于企业对经济前景不再那么悲观，美国小型企业的乐观情绪在 6 月份连续第三个月上升，达到今年以来的最高水平。【原文：US small-business optimism increased for a third straight month in June to the highest level this year as firms became less downbeat about the economy’s prospects.】

item.title: 对冲基金对强势英镑的押注在投票前创下六年新高
item.description: 在上周的英国大选之前，对冲基金对英镑走强的押注飙升至六年多来的最高点，因为投资者相信工党的胜利将给该国的政治和经济带来稳定。【原文：Hedge fund bets for a stronger pound surged to their highest in more than six years ahead of last week’s UK election as investors were confident that a Labour victory would bring stability to the country’s politics and economy.】

item.title: 埃利奥特称LME未披露镍案文件
item.description: 对冲基金埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）再次就2022年镍危机与伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）展开法律斗争，称该交易所未披露关键文件，而这些文件显示了它本可以如何应对空头挤压。【原文：Hedge fund Elliott Investment Management renewed its legal fight with the London Metal Exchange over the 2022 nickel crisis, saying that the exchange failed to disclose crucial documents that show how it could have responded to the runaway short squeeze.】

item.title: 花旗称是时候为高增长的人工智能股票预订利润了
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：The rally in artificial-intelligence stocks may show little sign of flagging, but a historical review suggests it’s time to take profit in the biggest names, according to strategists at Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔淡化对服务业高通胀的担忧
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，欧洲中央银行不应对顽固的服务业通胀和依然强劲的工资增长过于担忧。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t be overly worried about stubborn services inflation and still-robust wage growth, Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said.】

item.title: 法国小麦收成因暴雨降至四年最低水平
item.description: 由于欧洲最大的农业生产国降雨过多，影响了作物收成前景，法国的小麦收成将下滑至接近2020年的水平。【原文：France’s soft-wheat harvest is seen slumping to levels near those last seen in 2020, as excessive rain in Europe’s biggest agricultural producer hurt crop outlook.】

item.title: 地区协议生效，肯尼亚开始征收进口关税
item.description: 肯尼亚开始对从尿布到豌豆的所有商品征收进口关税，这是一项地区协议的一部分，威廉-鲁托总统决定取消提高国内税收的计划，但该协议仍未受到影响。【原文：Kenya began collecting import duties on everything from diapers to peas as part of a regional pact that remains unaffected by President William Ruto’s decision to scrap a plan to raise domestic taxes.】

item.title: 据说平安保险考虑今年出售可转债
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司正在考虑今年出售可转换债券，步阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）等中国科技公司的后尘。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co. is considering a convertible bond sale this year, according to people familiar with the matter, following in the footsteps of Chinese technology companies including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.】

item.title: Tempo称普拉博沃考虑取消印尼3%的赤字上限
item.description: 据当地新闻媒体 Tempo 报道，当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的团队据说正在考虑取消对印尼预算赤字的法律限制，因为即将上任的政府正在寻求更大的支出空间。【原文：President-elect Prabowo Subianto’s team is said to be considering removing legal limits on Indonesia’s budget deficit as the incoming administration looks for wider leeway to spend, according to a report by local news outlet Tempo.】

item.title: 路透社称 KKR 计划出售其持有的一半国际电气股份
item.description: 路透社援引两位知情人士的话称，私募股权公司 KKR & Co. 计划出售其在新上市的日本半导体设备制造商 Kokusai Electric Corp.【原文：Private equity firm KKR & Co. plans to sell about half of its stake in newly listed Japanese semiconductor equipment maker Kokusai Electric Corp., Reuters said, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比特币跌势买家两天内向美国 ETF 投资 4.38 亿美元
item.description: 投资者纷纷涌入比特币交易所交易基金，押注过去几周推动比特币走低的供应过剩已经创造了一个买入机会。【原文：Investors are piling into Bitcoin exchange-traded funds, betting the supply overhang that’s pushed the token lower in past weeks has created a buying opportunity.】

item.title: 莫迪面临预算压力，第二盟友寻求 36 亿美元援助
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的第二大盟友要求从印度今年的联邦预算中拨款 3,000 亿卢比（约合 36 亿美元），用于资助比哈尔邦的项目，这是对联合政府的一次考验。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s second-biggest ally is demanding 300 billion rupees ($3.6 billion) from India’s federal budget this year to help fund projects in Bihar state, according to people familiar with the matter, a test for the coalition government.】

item.title: 毛里求斯 5000 万美元干预未能阻止卢比下跌
item.description: 毛里求斯卢比兑美元汇率跌至历史新低，表明央行出售的 5000 万美元绿钞未能满足市场对美元的需求。【原文：Mauritius’s rupee slipped to a record low against the dollar, indicating that the central bank’s $50 million sale of the greenback fell short of market demand for the US currency.】

item.title: 英国招聘公司 PageGroup 盈利预警后暴跌
item.description: 英国招聘公司 Pagegroup Plc 在伦敦交易市场创下四年多来最大跌幅，此前该公司警告称，由于客户对招聘变得更加谨慎，今年的盈利可能会下降约 50%。【原文：British recruiter Pagegroup Plc fell the most in more than four years in London trading after warning that earnings this year will probably drop about 50% as clients become more reticent about hiring.】

item.title: 淡马锡中国赌注十年来首次低于美洲地区
item.description: 新加坡国有投资者淡马锡控股私人有限公司对中国的押注进一步减少，因为美国和印度在创造回报方面发挥了更大作用。【原文：Singapore state-owned investor Temasek Holdings Pte’s bets in China have soured further, as the US and India played a bigger role in generating returns.】
